title: Immunizations For Respiratory Viruses Prevention
content:
Steps you can take
Individuals can
Talk with a healthcare provider to make sure you are up to date on vaccines.
Review the
vaccine schedule
to become familiar with the immunizations recommended for you and when you should get them.
Visit
www.vaccines.gov
to locate pharmacies with vaccines near you.
Learn more about
how vaccine recommendations
are made.
Talk to your friends and family about the benefits of getting vaccinated.
Organizations can
